sentences.en: "Does it sound like music?" — "I wouldn't go that far."
sentences.cn: “这听上去像音乐吗？”——“我可不那样认为。”

sentences.en: a man of great integrity and sound judgement
sentences.cn: 一个非常正直、判断力强的人

sentences.en: a sound investment
sentences.cn: 合理的投资

sentences.en: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.cn: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.en: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.cn: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.en: a vowel sound
sentences.cn: 元音

sentences.en: Amy woke up to the sound of her doorbell ringing.
sentences.cn: 随着门铃叮当作响，埃米醒来了。

sentences.en: An untrained horse had taken fright at the sound of gunfire.
sentences.cn: 一匹未经训练的马听到枪响受了惊。

sentences.en: By the sound of it, things are worse than we thought.
sentences.cn: 听起来，情况比我们原来想的还要糟。

sentences.en: Davey sat as if hypnotized by the sound of Nick's voice.
sentences.cn: 戴维坐在那里，好像被尼克的声音迷住了似的。

sentences.en: faraway places with strange-sounding names
sentences.cn: 名字听起来怪怪的偏远地方

sentences.en: He did not sound as if he believed her.
sentences.cn: 他听起来似乎并不相信她。

sentences.en: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.cn: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

sentences.en: He was a very mechanical person, who knew a lot about sound.
sentences.cn: 他精通机械，了解许多有关声音的知识。

sentences.en: I heard what sounded like fireworks.
sentences.cn: 我听到像是烟花的声音。

sentences.en: I kept hearing the sound of applause in the background.
sentences.cn: 我不断听到隐约的鼓掌声。

sentences.en: I think it'sfair to say that it didn't sound quite right.
sentences.cn: 我想应该说那听起来可不太对。

sentences.en: I’ll come over to Richmond and take you out for dinner. How does that sound ? (= used to ask someone what they think of your suggestion )
sentences.cn: 我到里士满来，请你出去吃饭，怎么样？

sentences.en: It doesn't sound exactly orthodox, if I may say so.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那听起来不太符合常规。

sentences.en: Now it is an American economist who is sounding the alarm .
sentences.cn: 现在是一位美国的经济学家在提出警告。

sentences.en: of sound mind (=not mentally ill)
sentences.cn: 心智健全的

sentences.en: Several earlier studies had sounded similar warnings .
sentences.cn: 早先的几次研究也提出过类似的警告。

sentences.en: She had woken me out of a sound sleep.
sentences.cn: 她把我从酣睡中叫醒。

sentences.en: The book is full of sound advice.
sentences.cn: 这本书中有许多合理的建议。

sentences.en: The floor was completely sound.
sentences.cn: 地板完好无损。

sentences.en: The only sound was the crackle of breaking ice.
sentences.cn: 唯一的声响是冰层噼噼啪啪碎裂的声音。

sentences.en: There was a low humming sound in the sky.
sentences.cn: 空中传来一阵低沉的嗡嗡声。

sentences.en: There was a sound of loud voices from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 厨房传来一阵喧闹声。

sentences.en: There was a splintering sound as the railing gave way.
sentences.cn: 围栏倒下时发出了断裂的声音。

sentences.en: There were strange sounds coming from the next room.
sentences.cn: 隔壁房间传来奇怪的声音。

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: was always sounding off about higher taxes.
sentences.cn: 总是就更高税收有力地抒发自己的见解

words.tran_cn: 无声地；静悄悄地；完全静寂地
健全地；完全地；稳健地；彻底地；牢固地
音响发声器；鸣响的东西；发声者
健全的，健康的；合理的；可靠的；有效彻底的
[声]声音，语音；噪音；海峡；吵闹；听力范围；[医]探条
听起来；发出声音；回响；测深
听（诊）；测量，测…深；使发声；试探；宣告

phrases.tran_cn: 报数：喊行军齐步走口令
n. 音响系统；音响设备

trans.tran_cn: 明智的，透彻的，健康的，香甜的，严厉的
trans.tran_en: sensible and likely to produce the right results

trans.tran_cn: 声音，音乐风格，印象，海峡
trans.tran_en: something that you hear, or what can be heard
judging from what you have heard or read about something

trans.tran_cn: 听起来好像，鸣警报，测深度
trans.tran_en: to publicly give a warning or tell people to be careful
